property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each Angel Command and Armored Dragon in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever you put an Angel Command or a Dragon into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ If you have an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and add to its owner's shields face down. ■ If you have a Dragon in the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least one Dragon or Angel Command in your graveyard, you may cast a spell that has "shield trigger" from your hand for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a race other than Mecha Del Sol. Each creature of that race gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SYMPATHY}: Angel Command and Armored Dragon (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Angel Command, Armored Dragon in play. It can't cost less than 2.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ While you have no shields, this creature gets "speed attacker". ■ When your last shield is broken, before you break that shield destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ When your last shield is put into your graveyard, before you put that shield into your graveyard, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this spell gets the following Metamorph ability.) {METAMORPH}: Instead of tapping one of your opponent's creatures, tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "Bolmeteus Musha Dragon" attacks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone. ■ While you have a Fire Bird in the battle zone, this creature has "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Untap one of your Dragons in the battle zone.
